text: Cyril Jones (17 July 1920 – 27 November 1995) was a Welsh professional footballer who played as a defender. He made appearances in the English Football League with Wrexham. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Welsh footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Blaenau Ffestiniog Amateur F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Cyril Jones (footballer)
